Room.Name: Alturis Road/Kista Avenue Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Kista Avenue and Alturis Road.
Room.LongDescription: On the northeast side of the road is the magnificient Cathedral of Veratus. The Cathedral was built at the time of Randolf the Blue against the wishes of his council, but since the monks paid their taxes, they were allowed to build it anyway. The main entrance is a little way to the east, on the south side of the road.
